| Notes                   = Each Herald appears to represent one of the four [[wikipedia:Classical element|classical elements]] according to Greek philosophy: air ([[Gabriel Lan (Heroes Reborn) (Earth-616)|Air-Walker]]), fire ([[Pyreus Kril (Heroes Reborn) (Earth-616)|Firelord]]), water ([[Plasma (Heroes Reborn) (Earth-616)|Plasma]]), and earth ([[Tyros (Heroes Reborn) (Earth-616)|Terrax]]). As for the [[Norrin Radd (Heroes Reborn) (Earth-616)|Silver Surfer]], he may represent [[wikipedia:Aether (classical element)|aether]] or "energy," a fifth element associated with the other four in Medieval alchemy and in Asian philosophies.
